meanings.definition: A lipid compound that is derived from prostaglandins and has a role in blood clotting.
meanings.sent1: The thromboxane helped in the process of blood clotting after the injury.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the effects of thromboxane on blood clotting in the body.
meanings.sent3: The thromboxane decided to take charge of the blood clotting team.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like thromboxane, ensuring the blood clotting process was efficient.
meanings.sent5: The presence of thromboxane made the blood clotting mechanism more effective.

meanings.definition: Thromboxane is a vasoconstrictor and a potent hypertensive agent.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how thromboxane can cause blood vessels to constrict.
meanings.sent2: Researchers investigated the effects of thromboxane on blood pressure regulation.
meanings.sent3: Thromboxane thought it was the best at making blood vessels squeeze tight.
meanings.sent4: In stressful situations, her nerves felt like thromboxane, tightening everything inside.
meanings.sent5: The image of thromboxane squeezing the blood vessels stayed in his mind.
